page.title: 14Churches.
page.content: The vicar of{St.Matthews Church,} Parsons Heath, visits Parsons Heath School regularly and takes assemblies. Some of the activities that take place in the 4 year old church include a play-group, Scouts, Cubs, Brownies, Guides, and an O.A.P. tea-party. {St. John's C.of E. Church}is in mint condition, though 120 years old. The vicar, Mr. Nicholson, visits St. John's School weekly, and in assembly he talks about God and his creatures. The church affects many people's lives in the area with many activities for both children and adults. Other churches in the area include: {St. Anne's, Compton Road, } {St. James', East Hill,} {St. Andrew's, Harwich Road,} {St. Helen's, Priory Street.}
